sentences.english: Ali was the cock of the walk for many years in boxing circles .
sentences.chinese: 阿里在拳击圈里当了好几年的头号人物。

sentences.english: We can talk about Lamar Odom and Hedo Turkoglu and Trevor Ariza.
sentences.chinese: 我们可以谈到奥多姆，特克德鲁还有阿里扎。

sentences.english: This will give Yahoo direct and indirect ownership of 37 per cent of Alibaba.com.
sentences.chinese: 此举将令雅虎直接和间接持有阿里巴巴37%的股权。

sentences.english: Prince Aribert whispered under his breath.
Yamamoto: I wanted to call and tell you Ali's with me.
sentences.chinese: 我原想打电话告诉你阿里在我那里。

sentences.english: It's ten years since Arabella left me.
sentences.chinese: 阿里贝拉离开我有十年了。

sentences.english: This is Ramón and his son, Alex.
sentences.chinese: 是拉蒙和他儿子阿里克斯。

sentences.english: Aglianico is an Italian grape type for red wine. The variety has its roots in Greece.
sentences.chinese: 阿里亚尼考葡萄是酿制红葡萄酒的意大利葡萄品种。

sentences.english: I personally think that Arie might be the best actor.
sentences.chinese: 我个人感觉阿里演的最好。

sentences.english: A view of Pei-Men Station, Alishan Forestry Railway(Alishan Line), Chia-Yi.
sentences.chinese: 北门车站外的景致，阿里山森林铁路北门车站。

sentences.english: Ariadne will shut its door and be hidden within its enclosing cloud banks.
sentences.chinese: 阿里阿德涅会关紧它的门，躲进被云层围绕的堤岸。

sentences.english: Maybe you can give guitar lessons to my son, Alex.
sentences.chinese: 也许你能为我儿子阿里克斯上吉他课。

sentences.english: Taobao is run bye-commerce powerhouse Alibaba. com.
sentences.chinese: 淘宝网是由电子商务阿里巴巴网站运作的。

sentences.english: If you like, I can pick up Alex.
sentences.chinese: 如果你愿意，我可以去接阿里克斯。
